channel.title: How can i make a portal tele with options?
channel.description:
Hi, i want to make a portal that will come up with an interface that has options, and each of those options tele me to different places. Eg:
Click portal, inteface comes up, 'Barrows, 'Pest Control' 'Assault' etc and i click one and it tele's me, how do i do this?

item.title: How can i make a portal tele with options?
item.dc:creator: @jordan0100 jordan0100
item.description:
@jordan0100 wrote:

Hi, i want to make a portal that will come up with an interface that has options, and each of those options tele me to different places. Eg:

Click portal, inteface comes up, 'Barrows, ‘Pest Control’ ‘Assault’ etc and i click one and it tele’s me, how do i do this?
